frontmatter.title: Configure Cross-Origin Resource Sharing in Bold Reports
frontmatter.description: Learn about how to configure CORS(Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) settings and how to customize it in Bold Reports embedded application.

frontmatter.title: Configure Content Security Policy | Bold Reports on-premise
frontmatter.description: Learn about how to configure Content Security Policy (CSP) settings to secure sites in the Bold Reports embedded application.

frontmatter.title: Configure X-Frame-Options | Bold Reports on-premise
frontmatter.description: Learn about how to enable X-Frame-Options and restrict pages rendering in a frame to the current domain to secure sites in the Bold Reports embedded application.
